achievements.name: The Great Betrayal
achievements.description: As Venice, capture the Holy City of the religion that the city of Venice follows.

achievements.name: Run 50 Miles and Fight a Battle
achievements.description: As Zulu, have an Impi earn all of the special promotions.

achievements.name: Highway Robbery
achievements.description: Plunder a Caravan Trade Route.

achievements.name: Silk Road
achievements.description: Connect to the Arabs, China, India, the Mongols, and Persia at the same time using Caravans.

achievements.name: Greed is Good
achievements.description: Have a city with the Colossus, Petra, a Caravansary, and a Harbor.

achievements.name: Built in (Almost) a Day
achievements.description: Complete a Wonder in a city with three Trade Routes supplying production to it.

achievements.name: Merchant Prince
achievements.description: Generate 200 gold per turn via Trade Routes.

achievements.name: Raiders of the Lost Ark
achievements.description: Have your American Archaeologist extract an Artifact from Egypt with a German Archaeologist within 2 tiles.

achievements.name: Losing My Marbles
achievements.description: Extract 5 Artifacts from the territory of another major civilization.

achievements.name: It Belongs in a Museum
achievements.description: Have Artifacts from 10 different City-States in the Museums and Wonders in your civilization.

achievements.name: British Invasion
achievements.description: Perform a Concert Tour with an English Great Musician in American territory.

achievements.name: Rock the Kasbah
achievements.description: Perform a Concert Tour with a Great Musician on a Moroccan Kasbah improvement.

achievements.name: Radio Free Europe
achievements.description: Adopt the Freedom Ideology and fill 10 Broadcast Towers with Great Works.

achievements.name: Tear Down this Wall!
achievements.description: Force an AI player with the Order Ideology to switch to Freedom.

achievements.name: Pyramid Scheme
achievements.description: Playing as France, get the Louvre to the maximum theming bonus of 16.

achievements.name: Lingua Franca
achievements.description: Found the World Congress and remain its host for the entire game.

achievements.name: Flip-Flop
achievements.description: Propose to repeal an active Resolution which you had originally proposed to enact.

achievements.name: Dark Horse
achievements.description: Win a Diplomatic Victory without ever being the host of the World Congress.

achievements.name: Herculean Effort
achievements.description: Complete all International Projects in a single game as the highest contributor.

achievements.name: Soma Tablets for Everyone
achievements.description: Reach a Happiness level of over 100 for your civ.

achievements.name: That's XCOM baby!
achievements.description: Have your XCOM Squad go from 100 health to 0 in a single AI turn.

achievements.name: Legends of the Hidden Temple
achievements.description: Fully explore the Exploration Policy track.

achievements.name: Artistic License
achievements.description: Fully explore the Aesthetics Policy track.

achievements.name: I Prefer my Africa Scrambled
achievements.description: Win the Scramble for Africa scenario as any civ on any difficulty.

achievements.name: Praise the Victories
achievements.description: Win the Scramble for Africa playing as the Boers on Deity.

achievements.name: Ottoman Carpentry
achievements.description: Win the Scramble for Africa playing as the Ottomans on Deity.

achievements.name: Dr Livingstone I presume?
achievements.description: Playing as Belgium, move your Stanley Explorer to within a tile of Englandâ€™s Livingstone Explorer.

achievements.name: The Rhodes Colossus
achievements.description: Playing as England in Scramble for Africa, complete a railroad from Cairo to Capetown.

achievements.name: Nigerian Bank Account
achievements.description: In Scramble for Africa, marry Sokoto or Bornu.

achievements.name: Discoverer
achievements.description: Playing as Italy in Scramble for Africa, earn the VP for finding two Natural Wonders.

achievements.name: Glory, glory, hallelujah!
achievements.description: Win the Civil War scenario playing as the Union.

achievements.name: Standing like a Stone Wall
achievements.description: Win the Civil War scenario playing as the Confederates.

achievements.name: Red Badge of Courage
achievements.description: Win the Civil War scenario on Deity.

achievements.name: Pickett's Recharge
achievements.description: Capture Gettysburg with a Confederate Infantry unit possessing the George Pickett promotion.

achievements.name: Sheridan's Valley Campaign
achievements.description: As Union, control Winchester, Front Royal, Harrisonburg, Staunton, and Lynchburg.
